text: Is anybody using Julia in Kaiserslautern or at the DFKI in Germany?

elements.text: Is anybody using Julia in Kaiserslautern or at the DFKI in Germany?

text: My brother is using it (a bit) at the Fraunhofer institute. I was trying to give a Julia workshop there but at least the administration is very reluctant, unfortunately.

elements.text: My brother is using it (a bit) at the Fraunhofer institute. I was trying to give a Julia workshop there but at least the administration is very reluctant, unfortunately.

text: Our group at the TU Kaiserslautern is using it as foundation for OSCAR, <https://oscar.computeralgebra.de|https://oscar.computeralgebra.de>
